faqs.question: What exactly does DenixLabs do?
faqs.answer: We design, build, and deploy custom AI solutions—everything from computer-vision quality inspection to predictive analytics dashboards—so you can automate routine work and make decisions faster.

faqs.question: How do I know if AI is right for my company?
faqs.answer: If you have repeatable processes, large data sets, or tasks you wish were faster or more accurate, AI can usually pay for itself quickly. In fact, 75% of executives expect AI to create a competitive edge in their industry.

faqs.question: What data do we need to get started?
faqs.answer: High-quality, well-structured data—such as ERP exports, sensor logs, or CRM records—accelerates results, but imperfect data is normal. Part of our kickoff is a data audit where we clean, label, or integrate sources as needed.

faqs.question: How long does an AI project take?
faqs.answer: A proof of concept typically takes 6–12 weeks. Full production roll-outs range from 3–12 months, depending on scope and integration complexity.

faqs.question: What’s the cost range?
faqs.answer: Budgets vary with complexity, but small pilots often cost no more than a professional website build, while enterprise-scale deployments are priced like other major software initiatives. We always provide a fixed-price proposal after the discovery phase.

faqs.question: What ROI can we expect?
faqs.answer: Clients typically see 10–50% cost reductions, 15–30% revenue lifts, or process speeds up to 50% faster within the first year. We quantify ROI up front and track it after go-live.

faqs.question: Will AI replace my team’s jobs?
faqs.answer: AI automates repetitive tasks so people can focus on higher-value work. We include change-management and upskilling to ensure your staff benefits from the technology, not competes with it.

faqs.question: How do you keep our data secure and compliant (GDPR, etc.)?
faqs.answer: Your data stays yours. We use encryption in transit and at rest, follow least-privilege access, and design every solution to meet GDPR and other relevant regulations.

faqs.question: Do we need in-house AI talent to maintain the solution?
faqs.answer: Not necessarily. Many clients rely on our managed service, but we also train your team and document everything so you can own the system long-term.

faqs.question: What does the engagement process look like?
faqs.answer: Check out our services page for more details.
